00038 FXDEFMAP(RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher) LauncherMap[]={
00039   //____Message_Type_____________ID_______________Message_Handler_______
00040   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::ID_BTN_PLAY, RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::onPlayButtonPressed),
00041   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::ID_BTN_OPTS, RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::onOptionsButtonPressed),
00042   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::ID_BTN_QUIT, RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::onQuitButtonPressed),
00043   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_CLICKED, RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::ID_RENDERER, RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::onRenderComboPressed),
00044   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_DOUBLECLICKED, RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::ID_RENDERER, RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::onRenderComboDoubleClick),
00045 
00046 };
00047 
00048 FXIMPLEMENT(RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher,FXMainWindow,LauncherMap,ARRAYNUMBER(LauncherMap));

00056 RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::Launcher(FXApp * a)
00057    :FXMainWindow(a,"RainbruRPG launcher",NULL,NULL,DECOR_ALL,0,0,413,300){
00058 
00059   cbQuality=NULL;
00060   lbRend=NULL;
00061   criticalError=false;
00062   criticalMsg="";
00063 
00064 
00065   const char* banFN=USER_INSTALL_PREFIX"/share/RainbruRPG/data/fox/baniere.tga";
00066   FXImage *img=this->loadImage(banFN);
00067 
00068   // frame construction
00069   FXVerticalFrame *frame = new FXVerticalFrame(this, LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00070   // The image
00071   new FXImageFrame( frame, img);
00072 
00073   FXMatrix* frMatrix=new FXMatrix(frame, 2, 
00074                    LAYOUT_FILL_X|MATRIX_BY_COLUMNS|LAYOUT_BOTTOM, 0, 0, 0, 
00075                                   0, DEFAULT_SPACING, DEFAULT_SPACING, 
00076                                   DEFAULT_SPACING,DEFAULT_SPACING,  
00077                                   DEFAULT_SPACING, 20);
00078 
00079 
00080 
00081   // The quality static text
00082   new FXLabel(frMatrix, "Quality snapshot",  NULL,LAYOUT_FILL_COLUMN);
00083 
00084 
00085   // The snapshot combobox
00086   createSnapCombo( frMatrix );
00087 
00088   // The buttons
00089   FXMatrix* frButtons=new FXMatrix(frMatrix,LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_COLUMN);
00090   FXButton* btnPlay= new FXButton(frButtons,"Play",
00091                                   NULL,this,Launcher::ID_BTN_PLAY, 
00092                                   BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH,0,0,120);
00093 
00094   FXButton* btnOpt= new FXButton(frButtons,"Options", NULL,this,
00095                                  Launcher::ID_BTN_OPTS,
00096                                  LAYOUT_FILL_X|BUTTON_NORMAL);
00097   if (criticalError){
00098     btnOpt->disable();
00099     btnPlay->disable();
00100   }
00101 
00102   new FXButton(frButtons,"Quit", NULL,this,Launcher::ID_BTN_QUIT, 
00103                LAYOUT_FILL_X|BUTTON_NORMAL);
00104 
00105   createRenderCombo( frMatrix );
00106 
00107  }

00125 void RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::create(){
00126    FXMainWindow::create();
00127    show(PLACEMENT_SCREEN);
00128 
00129    if (criticalError){
00130      FX::FXMessageBox::error(getParent(), FX::MBOX_OK,
00131                              "Critical error",criticalMsg); 
00132    }
00133    else{
00134      xmlLanguage xl;
00135      if (xl.isLastUsedEmpty()){
00136        LanguageSelector ls( getApp());
00137        ls.execute(PLACEMENT_SCREEN);
00138      }
00139    }
00140  }

00152 long RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::
00153 onPlayButtonPressed(FXObject * obj , FXSelector sel ,void* ptr) {
00154 
00155   OptionManager::getSingleton().setLastUse( cbQuality->getText().text() );
00156   getApp()->stop(999);
00157 
00158   return 1;
00159 }

00169 FX::FXImage* RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::loadImage(const char* filename){
00170 
00171   FX::FXImage* img=new FX::FXTGAImage(getApp(),
00172                         NULL,IMAGE_KEEP|IMAGE_SHMI|IMAGE_SHMP);
00173   if(img){
00174     FXFileStream stream;
00175     if(stream.open(filename,FXStreamLoad)){
00176       img->loadPixels(stream);
00177       stream.close();
00178       img->create();
00179     }
00180   }
00181 
00182   return img;
00183 }

00197 long RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::
00198 onOptionsButtonPressed(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00199   LauncherOptions lo( getApp());
00200   
00201   // get the snapshot list
00202   tSnapshotList::const_iterator iter;
00203   xmlOptions xmlo;
00204   tSnapshotList* snapList=xmlo.getSnapshotList();
00205   
00206   // set the first snapshot as current one
00207   if (snapList){
00208     const char* firstOne=(*snapList->begin());
00209     OptionManager::getSingleton().loadSnapshot(firstOne);
00210   }
00211   
00212   lo.update();
00213   bool ret=lo.execute();
00214   
00215   if (ret)
00216     std::cout << "LauncherOptions returns TRUE" << std::endl;
00217   else
00218     std::cout << "LauncherOptions returns FALSE" << std::endl;
00219   
00220   
00221   // Update the snapshot list combobox
00222   createSnapCombo(NULL);
00223   
00224   return 1;
00225 
00226 }

00240 onQuitButtonPressed(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00241   getApp()->exit();

00243   return 1;

00251 void RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::createSnapCombo(FXComposite* parent){
00252   // The snapshots comboBox
00253   if (!cbQuality){
00254     cbQuality=new FXComboBox( parent, 31, NULL, 0, 
00255                               COMBOBOX_STATIC||LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH|LAYOUT_RIGHT,
00256                               0, 0, 200 );
00257   }
00258   else{
00259     cbQuality->clearItems();
00260   }    
00261 
00262   // get the snapshot list
00263   tSnapshotList::const_iterator iter;
00264   xmlOptions xmlo;
00265   tSnapshotList* snapList=xmlo.getSnapshotList();
00266   if (!snapList){
00267     LOGE("Cannot get the snapshot list");
00268     criticalError=true;
00269     criticalMsg="Cannot locate or load the options.xml file.\n\n"
00270                 "The play and options buttons are disabled\n"
00271                 "to prevent SEGFAULT crash.\n\n"
00272                 "Please examine the log file and try again.";
00273     cbQuality->appendItem("disabled");
00274     cbQuality->disable();
00275   }
00276   else{
00277     // setting the number of visible elements
00278     int i=snapList->size();
00279     if (i>10) i=10;
00280     cbQuality->setNumVisible(i);
00281 
00282     // populate the combo box
00283     if (snapList){
00284       for (iter=snapList->begin(); iter != snapList->end(); iter++){
00285         cbQuality->appendItem((*iter));
00286       }
00287     }
00288 
00289     // Preselect the lastUsed snapshot
00290     const char* lastUsed = OptionManager::getSingleton().getLastUse();
00291     FXint it= cbQuality->findItem(lastUsed);
00292     cbQuality->setCurrentItem(it);
00293   }
00294 }

00301 void RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::createRenderCombo(FXComposite* parent){ 
00302 
00303   // The renderers list box
00304   lbRend =new FXList(parent, this,ID_RENDERER,LIST_SINGLESELECT|
00305                      LAYOUT_FILL_Y|LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_COLUMN);
00306 
00307  
00308   Ogre::RenderSystemList* renderList=Ogre::Root::getSingleton()
00309     .getAvailableRenderers();
00310 
00311 
00312   Ogre::RenderSystemList::iterator renderIterator;      
00313     
00314   for( renderIterator= renderList->begin(); 
00315        renderIterator != renderList->end();
00316        renderIterator++){
00317     
00318     lbRend->appendItem((*renderIterator)->getName().c_str());
00319 
00320   } 
00321   
00322 }

00334 long RainbruRPG::Gui::Launcher::
00335 onRenderComboPressed(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00336   LOGI("Renderer selection changed");
00337   FXint i=lbRend->getCurrentItem();
00338 
00339   GameEngine::getSingleton().setRender(lbRend->getItemText(i).text());
00340 
00341   return 1;
00342 }
